After making these changes, please:

1. Open the Command Palette in VS Code (Ctrl+Shift+P)
2. Type "Developer: Reload Window" and select it
3. This will reload VS Code with the new configurations

If still having issues after reload:
1. Open Command Palette again
2. Type "Java: Clean Java Language Server Workspace" and select it
3. Select "Restart and delete" when prompted
